p: From Figure 3, Figure 4, Figure 9 and Figure 10 we find that most areas in Naqu Prefecture have an annual average precipitation of 250 mm to 400 mm, an annual accumulated temperature of 200 °C to 800 °C, both out of the threshold of the suitable hydrothermal conditions. These findings support most opinions of the related experts on “planting trees in Naqu Prefecture” [ 18], it may also imply that is is ossible to plant trees, especially shrubs and forests, in most alpine areas like the Tibetan Plateau.
